title: Indian banks' gross NPA ratio at multi-year low of 2.8%, net NPA down to 0.6% in FY24: RBI Fin Stability Report
description: The Reserve Bank of India reported that Indian banks' gross NPA ratio reached a multi-year low of 2.8%, with net NPA at 0.6% by March 2024. The global economy faces risks from geopolitical tensions and high public debt, but India's financial system remains robust, supporting economic growth through sustained credit expansion, the RBI said.
